text: Ko pangava nechitsidzirano sei naAllah nemutumwa wavo (SAW) kuma Mushrikoon (avo vasingatendi muhumwe hwaAllah), kunze kweavo vamakaita chitsidzirano navo padyo neAl- Masjid al-Haraam (kuMakkah)? Kana vari pachokwadi kwamuri, chivaiwo pachokwadi kwavari. Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoda Al-Muttaqoon (avo vanovatya, vatsvene)
